title: batch implementation of more data augmentations
description: About this kernel Implement CutMix, MixUp and GridMask in batch. Comparing timings - Batch operations are about 5x - 10x faster. The batch implemention for GridMask is kind partial. For a batch, grid width are fixed in that batch, but rotation angle can be random. References:  CutMix and MixUp on GPU/TPU (by Chris Deotte) GridMask data augmentation with tensorflow (by Xie29)
description_lemmatized: kernel implement cutmix mixup gridmask batch comparing timing batch operation 5x 10x faster batch implemention gridmask kind partial batch grid width fixed batch rotation angle random reference cutmix mixup gputpu chris deotte gridmask data augmentation tensorflow xie29
